name: EyeLight
description: My first game jam game and third game overall is horror top-down adventure game. This game was made for the Brackey's game jam 2022.2 with the "You're not alone'' theme. Your objective is to collect 6 USB's while the Eye is trying to scare and kill you. The Eye is so powerful that it's immortal (but can be damaged) and the only thing that can make it visible is the light. Game should be played in 1920x1080 resolution.
